ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
½ cup Italian flat leaf parsley, chopped
½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese

cookingTips: Do not overcook shrimp—cook only until pink, about 2-3 minutes per side
Use fresh parsley for bright flavor and verdant color
Grate Parmesan cheese fresh for best texture and taste
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a light, herbaceous sauce that complements the shrimp without overpowering it. Focus on timing to avoid rubbery shrimp.
